com.god.kahit.model

Class QuizGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.god.kahit.model.QuizGame

  • public class QuizGame
extends java.lang.Object
    responsibility: This class is a aggregate class for game play specific classes. Basically handles everything model related apart from players and teams. used-by: This class is used in the following classes: Repository
